alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County; South Central Utah; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 2:11PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Washington County through 245 PM MDT... At 210 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Apple Valley, or 13 miles northwest of Colorado City, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zion National Park, Hurricane, La Verkin, Apple Valley, Virgin and Rockville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
